verses.verse: And the second <WH8145> lot <WH1486> came out <WH3318> for Simeon <WH8095>, even for the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095> according to their families <WH4940>: and their inheritance <WH5159> was in the midst <WH8432> of the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063>.
And they had for their inheritance <WH5159> Beer-sheba <WH884>, or Sheba <WH7652>, and Moladah <WH4137>,
and Hazar-shual <WH2705>, and Balah <WH1088>, and Ezem <WH6107>,
and Eltolad <WH513>, and Bethul <WH1329>, and Hormah <WH2767>,
and Ziklag <WH6860>, and Beth-marcaboth <WH1024>, and Hazar-susah <WH2701>,
and Beth-lebaoth <WH1034>, and Sharuhen <WH8287>; thirteen <WH7969> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>:
Ain <WH5871>, Rimmon <WH7417>, and Ether <WH6281>, and Ashan <WH6228>; four <WH702> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>:

and all the villages <WH2691> that were round about <WH5439> these cities <WH5892> to Baalath-beer <WH1192>, Ramah <WH7414> of the South <WH5045>. This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095> according to their families <WH4940>.

Out of the part <WH2256> of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> was the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095>; for the portion <WH2506> of the children <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> was too much <WH7227> for them <WH1121>: therefore the children of Simeon <WH8095> had inheritance <WH5157> in the midst <WH8432> of their inheritance <WH5157>.

And the third <WH7992> lot <WH1486> came up <WH5927> for the children <WH1121> of Zebulun <WH2074> according to their families <WH4940>; and the border <WH1366> of their inheritance <WH5159> was unto Sarid <WH8301>;

and their border <WH1366> went up <WH5927> westward <WH3220>, even to Maralah <WH4831>, and reached <WH6293> to Dabbesheth <WH1708>; and it reached <WH6293> to the brook <WH5158> that is before <WH6440> Jokneam <WH3362>;

and it turned <WH7725> from Sarid <WH8301> eastward <WH6924> toward the sunrising <WH4217> unto the border <WH1366> of Chisloth-tabor <WH3696>; and it went out <WH3318> to Daberath <WH1705>, and went up <WH5927> to Japhia <WH3309>;
and from thence it passed along <WH5674> eastward <WH4217> to Gath-hepher <WH1662>, to Eth-kazin <WH6278>; and it went out <WH3318> at Rimmon <WH7417> which stretcheth unto Neah <WH5269>;
and the border <WH1366> turned <WH5437> about it on the north <WH6828> to Hannathon <WH2615>; and the goings <WH8444> out thereof were at the valley <WH1516> of Iphtah-el <WH3317>;
and Kattath <WH7005>, and Nahalal <WH5096>, and Shimron <WH8110>, and Idalah <WH3030>, and Bethlehem <WH1035>: twelve <WH8147> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.
This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the children <WH1121> of Zebulun <WH2074> according to their families <WH4940>, these cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.
The fourth <WH7243> lot <WH1486> came out <WH3318> for Issachar <WH3485>, even for the children <WH1121> of Issachar <WH3485> according to their families <WH4940>.
And their border <WH1366> was unto Jezreel <WH3157>, and Chesulloth <WH3694>, and Shunem <WH7766>,
and Hapharaim <WH2663>, and Shion <WH7866>, and Anaharath <WH588>,
and Rabbith <WH7245>, and Kishion <WH7191>, and Ebez <WH77>,
and Remeth <WH7432>, and Engannim <WH5873>, and En-haddah <WH5876>, and Beth-pazzez <WH1048>,

and the border <WH1366> reached <WH6293> to Tabor <WH8396>, and Shahazumah <WH7831>, and Beth-shemesh <WH1053>; and the goings <WH8444> out of their border <WH1366> were at the Jordan <WH3383>: sixteen <WH8337> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.
This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Issachar <WH3485> according to their families <WH4940>, the cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.
And the fifth <WH2549> lot <WH1486> came out <WH3318> for the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Asher <WH836> according to their families <WH4940>.
And their border <WH1366> was Helkath <WH2520>, and Hali <WH2482>, and Beten <WH991>, and Achshaph <WH407>,
and Allammelech <WH487>, and Amad <WH6008>, and Mishal <WH4861>; and it reached <WH6293> to Carmel <WH3760> westward <WH3220>, and to Shihor-libnath <WH7884>;

and it turned <WH7725> toward the sunrising <WH4217> to Beth-dagon <WH1016>, and reached <WH6293> to Zebulun <WH2074>, and to the valley <WH1516> of Iphtah-el <WH3317> northward <WH6828> to Beth-emek <WH1025> and Neiel <WH5272>; and it went out <WH3318> to Cabul <WH3521> on the left hand <WH8040>,
and Ebron <WH5683>, and Rehob <WH7340>, and Hammon <WH2540>, and Kanah <WH7071>, even unto great <WH7227> Sidon <WH6721>;

and the border <WH1366> turned <WH7725> to Ramah <WH7414>, and to the fortified <WH4013> city <WH5892> of Tyre <WH6865>; and the border <WH1366> turned <WH7725> to Hosah <WH2621>; and the goings <WH8444> out thereof were at the sea <WH3220> by the region <WH2256> of Achzib <WH392>;
Ummah <WH5981> also <WH663>, and Aphek, and Rehob <WH7340>: twenty <WH6242> and two <WH8147> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.
This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Asher <WH836> according to their families <WH4940>, these cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.
The sixth <WH8345> lot <WH1486> came out <WH3318> for the children <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321>, even for the children <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321> according to their families <WH4940>.

And their border <WH1366> was from Heleph <WH2501>, from the oak <WH438> in Zaanannim <WH6815>, and Adami-nekeb <WH129>, <WH5346> and Jabneel <WH2995>, unto Lakkum <WH3946>; and the goings <WH8444> out thereof were at the Jordan <WH3383>;

and the border <WH1366> turned <WH7725> westward <WH3220> to Aznoth-tabor <WH243>, and went out <WH3318> from thence to Hukkok <WH2712>; and it reached <WH6293> to Zebulun <WH2074> on the south <WH5045>, and reached <WH6293> to Asher <WH836> on the west <WH3220>, and to Judah <WH3063> at the Jordan <WH3383> toward the sunrising <WH4217>.
And the fortified <WH4013> cities <WH5892> were Ziddim <WH6661>, Zer <WH6863>, and Hammath <WH2575>, Rakkath <WH7557>, and Chinnereth <WH3672>,
and Adamah <WH128>, and Ramah <WH7414>, and Hazor <WH2674>,
and Kedesh <WH6943>, and Edrei <WH154>, and En-hazor <WH5877>,
And Iron <WH3375>, and Migdal-el <WH4027>, Horem <WH2765>, and Beth-anath <WH1043>, and Beth-shemesh <WH1053>; nineteen <WH8672> cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.
This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321> according to their families <WH4940>, the cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.
The seventh <WH7637> lot <WH1486> came out <WH3318> for the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> according to their families <WH4940>.
And the border <WH1366> of their inheritance <WH5159> was Zorah <WH6881>, and Eshtaol <WH847>, and Ir-shemesh <WH5905>,
and Shaalabbin <WH8169>, and Aijalon <WH357>, and Ithlah <WH3494>,
and Elon <WH356>, and Timnah <WH8553>, and Ekron <WH6138>,
and Eltekeh <WH514>, and Gibbethon <WH1405>, and Baalath <WH1191>,
and Jehud <WH3055>, and Bene-berak <WH1139>, and Gath-rimmon <WH1667>,
and Me-jarkon <WH4313>, and Rakkon <WH7542>, with the border <WH1366> over against <WH4136> Joppa <WH3305>.

And the border <WH1366> of the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> went out <WH3318> beyond them <WH1121>; for the children of Dan <WH1835> went up <WH5927> and fought <WH3898> against Leshem <WH3959>, and took <WH3920> it <WH5221>, and smote it with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>, and possessed <WH3423> it <WH3427>, and dwelt therein <WH7121>, and called Leshem <WH3959>, Dan <WH1835>, after the name <WH8034> of Dan <WH1835> their father <WH1>.
This is the inheritance <WH5159> of the tribe <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> according to their families <WH4940>, these cities <WH5892> with their villages <WH2691>.

So they made an end <WH3615> of distributing the land <WH776> for inheritance <WH5157> by the borders <WH1367> thereof <WH1121>; and the children of Israel <WH3478> gave <WH5414> an inheritance <WH5159> to Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> in the midst of them <WH8432>:

according to the commandment <WH6310> of Jehovah <WH3068> they gave <WH5414> him the city <WH5892> which he asked <WH7592>, even Timnath-serah <WH8556> in the hill-country <WH2022> of Ephraim <WH669>; and he built <WH1129> the city <WH5892>, and dwelt therein <WH3427>.

These are the inheritances <WH5159>, which Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548>, and Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126>, and the heads <WH7218> of the fathers <WH1>' houses of the tribes <WH4294> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, distributed for inheritance <WH5157> by lot <WH1486> in Shiloh <WH7887> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>, at the door <WH6607> of the tent <WH168> of meeting <WH4150>. So they made an end <WH3615> of dividing <WH2505> the land <WH776>.
